
| Key                   | Description                    |
|-----------------------|--------------------------------|
| NumPad 0              | camera view                    |
| NumPad 1/3/7          | front / right / top view       |
| ctrl NumPad 1/3/7     | back / left / bottom           |
| 5                     | perspective / orth             |
| b                     | select with mouse              |
| b + wheel click       | remove from selection          |
| c + right click       | circle select                  |
| c + wheel click       | circle deselect                |
| e                     | extrude                        |
| g                     | move                           |
| z                     | toggle solid/wireframe         |
| v                     | rip line                       |
| p                     | separate selection             |
| w                     | option menu                    |
| f                     | fill/connect                   |
| s                     | scale                          |
| r                     | rotate                         |
| r + x                 | rotate over x                  |
| r + y?                | rotate over y?                 |
| t                     | toolbar                        |
| n                     | obj properties                 |
| x                     | delete obj                     |
| space                 | search menu                    |
| ctr + shift + alt + c | set obj origin                 |
| shift + a             | add objs                       |
| shift + d             | duplicate objs                 |
| alt + d               | duplicate objs linked          |
| right click           | select                         |
| ctrl + tab            | change selection mode          |
| ctrl + l              | select linked objs             |
| shift + right click   | add to selection               |
| ctrl + right click    | lasso add to selection         |
| ctrl + +/-            | grow / shrink selection        |
| ctrl + r              | loop cut                       |
| ctrl + r, wheel       | add subdivisions               |
| ctrl + j              | join objs                      |
| ctrl + b              | create bevel curve             |
| ctrl + b, wheel       | create bevel curve, add subdiv |
| shift + b, mouse sel  | zoom to square                 |
| alt + right click     | edge loop                      |
